players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was killed, so he was non‑mafia. That means either detective or villager. Since we have 2 villagers, one of us is the other villager. I suspect Alice."
Diana: "Alice is the detective, so she can't be mafia. That leaves Charlie as the only suspect."
You: "I investigated Diana and found her to be mafia. Bob was killed, so he was non‑mafia. That leaves Charlie as the only suspect. Diana knows I'm detective, so she might try to frame me."
Diana: "I didn't kill Bob, I was in my room. Alice's claim is wrong. Charlie is the only suspect."
Charlie: "Alice found Diana to be mafia. Vote for Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
